name: Smoking Layer
description:
If you want to play through the WebGL version, you may want to enable fullscreen mode.

Description :

Use the ozone layer to block the toxic smoke and prevent it from going beyond the layer.

This game was originally made in 5 hours (sorry) for the Trijam 118 with the theme "Toxicity".

Controls :

  • Left and Right click : Make the wind blow to the right or left.
  • Escape : Quit the game.

Credits :

Every asset is self-made with these software :

  • Unity 3D
  • Photoshop
  • FL Studio
  • Audacity

The font used are Arial and Asdonuts.
